text: Ok something odd here....I'm missing padding on one of my modules and if I change the background color it affects modules below it also. I've moved it to another area and the empty drag and drop area shows so I'm not sure what is going on. Any ideas?
Hi-- Is there a way to set up smart rules that take place from redirects?
Could you give us a bit more clarification on what you are trying to accomplish?

So we are combining 5 different companies into 1 and would like to have a header that populates depending on where the traffic is coming from. So say someone is being redirected from <http://CompanyA.com|CompanyA.com> to <http://CompanyX.com|CompanyX.com>, they would see a specific header saying something along the lines of "CompanyA is now a part of CompanyX"
